channel.title: Events on Finance and Analytics Club
channel.description: Recent content in Events on Finance and Analytics Club

item.title: Introductory lecture on Stock Markets
item.description: “Finance is not merely about making money. It’s about achieving our deep goals and protecting the fruits of our labour. It’s about stewardship and, therefore, about achieving the good society.
